name: daza.ar-env
description: Development environment setup tool for daza.ar ecosystem. Minimal, KISS, and only essential scripts.

scripts.build: echo 'Use site-specific build scripts or Vite as needed.'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:root && npm run lint:sites
scripts.lint:sites: find sites -name '*.js' -o -name '*.mjs' -o -name '*.ts' | head -1 >/dev/null && find sites -name '*.js' -o -name '*.mjs' -o -name '*.ts' -exec eslint {} + || echo 'No JS/TS files found in sites'
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:root -- --fix && npm run lint:sites -- --fix 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.format: npm run format:root && npm run format:sites
scripts.format:sites: find sites -type f \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.mjs' -o -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.json' -o -name '*.md' -o -name '*.css' -o -name '*.html' \) -exec prettier --write {} + 2>/dev/null || echo 'No files to format in sites'
scripts.format:check: prettier --check *.js *.json *.md *.css *.html && find sites -type f \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.mjs' -o -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.json' -o -name '*.md' -o -name '*.css' -o -name '*.html' \) -exec prettier --check {} + 2>/dev/null || true
